<h1 align="center">
  tedgeving.com
</h1>

Personal site built using Gabsty, WordPress (as a datasource) and deployed to Netlify.  For bonus points the WordPress site is configured to deploy to Netlify.

The following plugin makes quick work of the setup and deployment process.
https://github.com/justinwhall/littlebot-netlify

You can view the final site here:
https://wizardly-bhabha-01ae0a.netlify.com
